cmp: 未 (1-3 p.m./8th earthly branch/not yet/did not/have not/not)
云 ((classical) to say, cloud/(abbr.) for Yunnan/surname)

exm.mng: plowing and weeding, farm work, fig. to work or study diligently
to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)
you get what you put in, you reap what you sow
exm.pyn: yī fēn gēng yún , yī fēn shōu huò
